TopicTitle: NRE:Instance of object not set, FAR maybe?

Articles.Content: i have a lot of mods, including kopernicus, KSPi, pathfinder and angel125s other mods, and alot of planet packs, and i have a bug where when i go to the pause menu, the game physics still continue moving, but the camera gets locked in place, and a single NRE: instance of an object not set or something error in the log, and in the editor far, when checking voxels, complains about 3 triangles either Nan or degenerate, or something siimiliar. im also using kerbal foundries mod, too. heres a link to my ksp.log : https://onedrive.live.com/redir?resid=3315713f440a6017!591&authkey=!APza0ceq5dxbOQU&ithint=file%2clog
